channel.title: Comments on: Modern-Day Sirens: Katie Crutchfield
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: K.Hartless
item.dc:creator: K.Hartless
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://lunastationquarterly.com/modern-day-sirens-katie-crutchfield/#comment-2126">tiffanyarpdaleo</a>.
Thank you, Tiffany. I was popping by today and finally saw this kind comment. I appreciate your support so very much.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to tiffanyarpdaleo.

Thank you, Tiffany. I was popping by today and finally saw this kind comment. I appreciate your support so very much.

item.title: By: tiffanyarpdaleo

item.description: Great idea, looking forward to learning of more amazing women!!
item.content:encoded: Great idea, looking forward to learning of more amazing women!!
